name: Eijukugo Target 1000
description: Eijukugo Target 1000 is an educational English language learning game based on the Eijukugo Target series of books by Obunsha. These books teach a common common set of English phrases in order to help students pass English exams. This game, specifically, is based on the Eijukugo Target 1000 book, which teaches 1000 common English phrases. It features a dictionary of the 1000 phrases along with a basic flashcard-style game in which players must pick the correct translation for different English phrases.
